item.title: Report X-2024110293
item.description:
Report X-2024110293

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-10T12:20:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-30
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: A LEAKING HAZARDOUS PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO THE PSC FOR PROCESSING. IT HAD SHIPPING PAPERS FOR EXPLOSIVE PRIMER CAPS. ONE PRODUCT WAS LEAKING INSIDE THE BOX, A "ONE SHOT" CARTRIDGE CASE SOLUTION. AS WE CANNOT RETURN EXPLOSIVES VIA SALVAGE DRUM, THEY SHALL BE PROCESSED AS FWN. THE "ONE SHOT" SHALL BE DMP'D, AND ALL NON DAMAGED/ NON HAZARDOUS PRODUCTS, SHALL BE RETURNED AS NORMAL GROUND SHIPPING RETURN.

item.title: Report X-2024110256
item.description:
Report X-2024110256

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-10T12:20:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-28
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER FOLLOWED DECISION TREE AFTER NOTIFICATION FOR LEAKING PACKAGE. UPON RETURNING TO PSC, NOTIFIED RMP OF SUSPECTED UNDECLARED. NEW RMP IN TRAINING TOOK 6-SIDED PHOTOS OF PACKAGING, CONTENTS AND NOTIFIED FT RMP FOR NEED TO CALL INTO HMSC.

item.title: Report X-2024110257
item.description:
Report X-2024110257

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-10T12:20:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-26
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: LEAKER FOUND IN WEST SORT AISLE. RESPONDER BROUGHT LEAKING PACKAGE TO PSC. DAMAGE INSPECTION REVEALED LEAKING BOTTLE OF POOL PRODUCTS, ONE CONTAINER OF LEISURE TIME RENEW, AND 3 OTHER NON-LEAKING CONTAINERS OF POOL RELATED PRODUCTS. CHECK OF SDS REVEALED RENEW TO BE A POTENTIAL UNDECLARED HAZMAT.
